forecast.day_comments: A 10 percent chance of snow after 4am.  Mostly cloudy, with a low around 25. Wind chill values between 17 and 22. Southwest wind around 7 mph.
forecast.night_comments: Snow, mainly after noon.  High near 33. Wind chill values between 19 and 28. South southwest wind around 7 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

forecast.day_comments: Snow, mainly after 2pm.  Areas of freezing fog between 4pm and 5pm. Temperature falling to around 31 by 5pm. Wind chill values between 24 and 29. Southwest wind around 7 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 80%. Total daytime snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: Snow, mainly before midnight.  Patchy fog before 10pm, then patchy fog after 1am. Low around 25. Wind chill values between 18 and 23. South southwest wind around 7 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.

forecast.day_comments: Snow.  Steady temperature around 31. South southwest wind around 6 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 100%. Total daytime snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: Snow before 2am, then snow likely after 4am.  Low around 24. Wind chill values between 17 and 22. South southwest wind around 7 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 90%. Total nighttime snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.
